page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
Chesterfield has a theatre known as the {POMEGRANATE,}showing plays,pop concerts,dancing,variety shows and local repertory productions.In the {LECTURE THEATRE}the Chest'd festival of music takes place along with short lectures, recitals and exhibitions. There are the {GOLDWELL ROOMS}used for musical concerts,wrestling,roller skating,table tennis,badminton and flea markets.While in the new {DANCE {STUDIO}ballroom,sequence,tap,ballet, disco dancing and gymnastics are being taught.The {BRADBURY CLUB }housed in Bradbury Hall has a first class snooker room where national and local tournaments are held.The town also has its night clubs,the {AQUARIUS}and the {ADAM AND EVE }plus several first class restaurants and an {ABC CINEMA}.
